content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: black_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "black_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 16}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 56, "index": 26}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 55, "index": 36}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft black_terracotta, I need to first craft black_dye. Black_dye can be crafted from an ink_sac. The ink_sac is at slot 42, and I will move it to the crafting grid slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "black_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 16}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 56, "index": 26}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 55, "index": 36}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: I can now craft black_dye by moving the black_dye from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "black_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 16}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 56, "index": 26}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 55, "index": 36}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]

thought: Now that I have crafted the black_dye, I can craft black_terracotta by placing the black_dye next to a terracotta block. The terracotta block is at slot 39, and I will move it to the crafting grid slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have placed the terracotta block in the crafting grid, I can place the black_dye next to it by moving the black_dye from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 2 with quantity 1
